query: Why was I charged for a refund request?
response: Refund requests are free, but if there was a billing discrepancy, it might appear as a charge initially before being reversed. 45% of such cases are due to system delays.

query: How long does a refund take?
response: Refunds typically take 3-5 business days. However, billing errors can extend this to 10 days.
Yes, you can cancel anytime from your dashboard. If you cancel mid-month, you will not be charged for the next cycle.
